var months=[];months[0]="January";months[1]="February";months[2]="March";months[3]="April";months[4]="May";months[5]="June";months[6]="July";months[7]="August";months[8]="September";months[9]="October";months[10]="November";months[11]="December";//returns date in "January, 2020" format
export var dateFormatted=function dateFormatted(date){var month=months[date.getMonth()];var year=date.getFullYear();return"".concat(month,", ").concat(year);};
